items.headline: GM’s stock pushes to a new record, as carmaker calls for higher profit ahead
items.summary_en: GM is adjusting to declining customer interest in electric vehicles as the automaker boosted its dividend and announced a new stock buyback.

items.headline: Pinterest is slashing jobs and office space as it switches focus to AI roles
items.summary_en: Pinterest’s stock drops after a disclosure that it plans to cut about 15% of its workforce, as it reallocates resources to AI-focused roles and products.

items.headline: Why shares of UnitedHealth, Humana and other insurers tanked — and took the Dow with them
items.summary_en: Shares of UnitedHealth, Humana and other health insurers were clobbered Tuesday after a preliminary payment proposal for Medicare Advantage fell way short of analyst expectations.

items.headline: These home buyers are suing one of the biggest mortgage lenders in America. Why you should pay attention.
items.summary_en: A class-action lawsuit against mortgage-lending giant Rocket Companies accuses the company of illegally steering homebuyers toward using their services and away from cheaper alternatives.

items.headline: Micron’s stock is surging as the company looks to cash in on a ‘desperate’ market

items.headline: Dollar tumbles to a four-year low as Trump claims it’s ‘doing great’
items.summary_en: The U.S. dollar fell to its lowest level in four years on Tuesday despite President Donald Trump claiming it was “doing great” in a speech in Iowa.

items.headline: Cloudflare’s stock pops on viral Moltbot. Here’s how a cybersecurity company became the newest AI winner.
items.summary_en: The rise of autonomous personal assistants like Moltbot is creating a new bull case for companies that help secure digital identities and local data, analysts said.

items.headline: Here’s how Amazon is looking to take on Walmart at its own game
